definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: The doctor says that I should take quinine .
sentences.chinese: 醫生說我應該服用金雞納霜。

sentences.english: Quinine is a cure for colds.
sentences.chinese: 金雞納霜是治療風寒的藥方。

sentences.english: Nearby grew a tree, nowadays known as Cinchona.
sentences.chinese: 附近長着一顆樹，現在知道是一棵金雞納樹。
